files.name: grid-gap-demo.tsx
files.content:
"use client"

import { Grid } from "ui"

export default function GridGapDemo() {
  return (
    <Grid
      columns={{
        initial: 4,
        sm: 5,
        md: 6
      }}
      gap={{
        initial: 2,
        sm: 4
      }}
    >
      <Grid.Item>
        <div className="p-4 border h-24" />
      </Grid.Item>
      <Grid.Item>
        <div className="p-4 border h-24" />
      </Grid.Item>
      <Grid.Item>
        <div className="p-4 border h-24" />
      </Grid.Item>
      <Grid.Item>
        <div className="p-4 border h-24" />
      </Grid.Item>
      <Grid.Item>
        <div className="p-4 border h-24" />
      </Grid.Item>
      <Grid.Item>
        <div className="p-4 border h-24" />
      </Grid.Item>
    </Grid>
  )
}
